descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# A Magical Pet #

**Meet Ember, Your New Best Friend** 
- She'll bring magic and mischief into your home, and take you on an adventure in her fantastical world.

[media]
 

# A Living World #
- Ember’s world is full of creatures to chase and ways to interact.

[media]

# A Friend Who's Always There #
- Ember shares your home, always there to play with, care for, or snuggle on the couch after a long day.

[media]
# Endless Ways to Play #
- You and Ember work as a team to harvest resources, banish thorny weeds, and explore the mysterious Otherlands.

[media]

# Collect, Trade, Buy  #
- Forage resources and trade them in trade for new toys and clothes to suit your Ember’s unique look and personality.

[media]


Stay: Forever Home by the creators of **Bogo** and **First Steps**

# A Magical Pet #

**Meet Ember, Your New Best Friend** 
- She'll bring magic and mischief into your home, and take you on an adventure in her fantastical world.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499623592_1242411587354095_8518052294169653959_n.mp4?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=WVEkMpUnmy8Q7kNvwHv1dl5&_nc_oc=AdmPcILG6rYfT4he6T4KihU-Q1s0-o_y9v6yrTM4jlTPLa3E_6z9bD-CyQPOr6LZEpA&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=8KzHu-93NYV7GRE99RG3oA&oh=00_AfqiXuYT5c6h0aJ79usxDos0VzmmIVVddvdwUZgM9XdE5w&oe=696D8050)
 

# A Living World #
- Ember’s world is full of creatures to chase and ways to interact.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491824697_1278851210611188_4094365675689352297_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=8jkH1Ay0E0oQ7kNvwEmTgvW&_nc_oc=AdllzHpHu-aX5-NpcgD71bnxGWWBNmW8G-EQTyxAc-q0aDlK9gVZN0WlvEYBjUNAAAY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=8KzHu-93NYV7GRE99RG3oA&oh=00_AfopgzZOAS6ntJj10cXSZ0Z_c8ovWFBOXRqUBLT8eUS5-w&oe=696D69D6)

# A Friend Who's Always There #
- Ember shares your home, always there to play with, care for, or snuggle on the couch after a long day.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499292426_1471237290743467_5955331649547554072_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=YVKQjzMf1LQQ7kNvwGII6gf&_nc_oc=Adn0gVBP_SXMBwqH_kY-lRmdz73hvRk2dhtPzLVa6OIAmOorlLTfYVzCBl9mSwbRRpI&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=8KzHu-93NYV7GRE99RG3oA&oh=00_AfrVi2HB_y__b5zDwq5MenzD9N_s9agl9pfRVfPH3pz2ZA&oe=696D74C5)
# Endless Ways to Play #
- You and Ember work as a team to harvest resources, banish thorny weeds, and explore the mysterious Otherlands.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499299164_23905805109048560_5254487432958572571_n.mp4?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=8TCdmAp1dzYQ7kNvwE27XeO&_nc_oc=AdmzWyRBGlicJ1NUf22CqbyX1YDKmLN8liUMWujTky17QBdHkeu_3_hf0GFa75P67ik&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=8KzHu-93NYV7GRE99RG3oA&oh=00_AfrVcBmgf3fhkN8Sk7cpu35Z9H-0lDaberrOOy72ACVRGg&oe=696D6767)

# Collect, Trade, Buy  #
- Forage resources and trade them in trade for new toys and clothes to suit your Ember’s unique look and personality.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491819854_2661665637369878_2167100156395054220_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=yNt5SS5RMJEQ7kNvwFyh2Fz&_nc_oc=Adn2f3pgWO4Gl2IdRU7PSBxzCuyneOTYvrB2EvkT-CVL9huie3AaTSfL9f6NggBdH8w&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=8KzHu-93NYV7GRE99RG3oA&oh=00_Afoo8_R6NDn39jBsrAxaE7WU5yk9tnNJzxRVrA-r8njEUA&oe=696D6669)
